price: 68. Dijeron: “¡Quémenlo en una hoguera si quieren proteger a sus ídolos!”.
arabic: قَالُواْ حَرِّقُوهُ وَٱنصُرُوٓاْ ءَالِهَتَكُمۡ إِن كُنتُمۡ فَٰعِلِينَ

version.title: Spanish Translation (Latin America) - Noor International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish (Latin America) by Noor International (Ed. 2017)

meta.transliteration: qālū ḥarriqūhu wa-unṣurū ālihatakum in kuntum fāʿilīna
